titleStmt.title: Remarks on the several sanguinary and penal laws made in Parliament against Roman Catholics with some reasons humbly offer'd in order to obtain a repeal of those laws, for the better advancement of His Majesty's service, and the ease of many of his most loyal subjects.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Henry Hills ..., and are to be sold at his Printing-house ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
